item.title: IMGN
item.description: score:162 Chances: ImmunoGen (IMGN) has seen solid earnings estimate revision activity over the past two months. ImmunoGen might move higher on growing optimism about its earnings prospects. ImmunoGen and other stocks have been added to the Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy) List. ImmunoGen Announces Inducement Grants Under Nasdaq Listing Rule 5635(c)(4).

item.title: TGTX
item.description: score:343 Chances: TG Therapeutics, Inc. has entered into an agreement to acquire a worldwide license to Precision BioSciences, Inc.’s Azercabtagene Zapreleucel (azer-cel), an allogeneic CD19 CAR T cell therapy program for autoimmune diseases. The average of price targets set by Wall Street analysts indicates a potential upside of 127.

item.title: ARWR
